Product_Name: XANES F15 1.3 IPS Color Screen Waterproof Smart Watch Heart Rate Monitor Fitness Bracelet Fitbit Mi Band
Product_Description_1:

German, Arabisch, Japanese, Korean
APP LanguageRussian, Ukrainian, English, Spanish, French,
German, Arabisch, Japanese, Korean,
Italian, Portuguese (APP synchronization)

Features:
1. Main interface
- Press the touch area in the main interface to switch the dial directly,
  you also could customize the dial with your own photos.
2. Pedometer step counter
- Always check the number of steps walking in the day, You can also be synchronized
  to the APP in time, view and analyze the movement data.
3. Movement distance and calories
- The device automatically monitors the movement of mileage, calories consumption.
4. Health monitoring
- Long press to enter the heart rate, real-time monitoring, Blood pressure monitoring, blood oxygen monitoring.
5. A variety of Sports mode monitoring, Press to enter the movement mode monitoring. 7 kinds of Sports Mode available:
- Walk/Run/Riding/Skipping/Badminton/Basketball/Swimming
6. Sleep quality monitoring
- Wearing a bracelet to sleep, it can monitor the length of sleep, deep sleep, and light sleep state.
  According to the data, you can adjust the sleep status, improve the health index.
7. Messages reminder/Message push
- When there is a new message, the device will vibrate to remind you and display the message on the screen.
  The corresponding message displays the corresponding icon, the F15 will retain the current 3 messages.
  And the messages support Multi-language display: Russian, English, Spanish, French, German, Arabisch, Japanese, Korean.
8. Music Control
- You could remote your mobile phone music when the watch connects with the app, convenient for your
  running with music, no need to take out your mobile phone from your pocket to change music any more.
9. Multi-language Support
- The watch support Russian, Ukrainian, English, Spanish, French, German, Arabisch, Japanese, Korean.
   And the application support Russian, Ukrainian, English, Spanish, French, German, Arabisch, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Portuguese.
10. Creative Watch Dial
- You could use your own photoes to customize the watch background, make your own style watch.
11. More Functions
- Screen brightness adjustment, Weather forecast, Incoming call remind, Stopwatch,
  Alarm clock, Sedentary reminder, Find bracelet, Remote control camera.

Package Included:
1 × XANES F15 Smart Watch
1 × User Manual
1 × Charging Cable
Options: Color Black Gray/Color Black Green/Color Blue White/Color Red Black/Color White Black/

UX Smart Bluetooth Touch Screen Watch With Heart Rate Sensor Perfectly Compatible With IOS & Android

Dear customer,when you get the watch,first you can  install application program in your phone. Smartblue” APP acquisition method of Iphone is search “Smartblue” in APP store directly for downloading. Andriod mobile phone you can install “Smartwatch.apk” application program in Android smartphone.

Specifications:
Model: UX
Suitable for: IOS & Android system
Bluetooth: BT3.0/BT4.0
Size: 52.5x37.5x10mm(no contains strap)
Material: SUS Front Shell + Import GEP PC Back Shell +GEP Silicone Strap
Color: black,silver,white
Screen: 1.44inch Capacitive Touch Screen
Language: Chinese, English and multi-language
Resolution: 128*128 pixels
Sensor: 3D Magsensor,3D Gravity Acceleration Sensor
Battery: 260 mAh Li-polymer Battery
Standby Time: About 180 Hours 

Functions:
1.Wrok with IOS & Android phones(bluetooth BT3.0/BT4.0)
2.Bluetooth sync and settings
3.Phone book(1000)
4.Call and answer phone (must insert earphones in watch,Long press the button of earphone 2 sec to answer or hang up while calling)
5.Messaging(This function is not supported by Iphone currently)
6.Call log(missed calls,dialled calls,received calls,all calls)
7.Notifier(Such instant messages as QQ/WeChat can be checked)
8.Music(This function must insert earphones in watch)
9.Camera
10.Settings
11.Anti lost(After opening, watch will make alarming sound after watch is a certain distance away from phone)
12.Ringtone
13.Sleep monitor
14.Language(Watch language can be set)
15.Pedometer
16.Stopwatch
17.Ecompass
18.Heart rate
19.Clocktype
20.Alarm

How to use the watch:
Key at upper left: key for entering main menu and enter key
Key at lower left: key for return
Key on the right: long press is for startup and shutdown, while short press is for returning back to standby interface)
Touch panel silk-screen key: enter key
Touch panel gesture action: return by sliding from left to right; confirm by sliding from right to left
Touch panel: confirm by clicking screen

HOW TO USE
Left Key:
long press this button will power on/ off in the standby interface, short press to return to the standby interface. In the menu, long press to select the nest function. And while there have a incoming call, press this key is to refuse call.

Right Key:
short press to enter the main menu in the standby interface, press to confirm in the main menu. In the menu, short press to select the upon function. And while there have a incoming call, press this key is to stop shaking.
